about_the_game:
Become a father who's helping his family survive in a city overrun by a horde of zombies. Build fortifications in your house, set up traps, and repair the damage caused by ravenous ghouls during attacks on your villa.

Protect your family


Family comes first. Mind your house and don't let the zombies break into your beloved wife and daughter's room.

Secure the entrances


Deal with the monsters swiftly and barricade the doors well. Collect construction materials, useful in upgrading the defenses of your stronghold. -Ahem- That is to say, your quaint abode. Make sure all its entrances remain secured, at least for now…

Obtain food and medicine


Explore the fallen city in search of invaluable food and medicine for your loved ones. You have your trusty car at your disposal, which will help you avoid roving bands of the undead.
Find medicine that will help you treat your wounds and your wife's infection. Maybe you'll even manage to resupply on fuel and ammo at your local gas station.

Search the neighborhood


Investigate the treacherous area and tear through the hellish hordes. Sadly, it seems a local gang has already looted most of the useful and desirable items, including equipment for crafting new weapons among other things.

Make new friends


There are still survivors in nearby houses who will eagerly establish contact you. Help them by assisting with their problems and earn their trust. It might save your life someday…

Meet local authorities


The city is under a new law of might set by the local mob. Meet its leader and try to reach some kind of understanding. It is unfortunate that the majority of food and medicine is found inside their storage, where you have no access. This might change if you agree to do some dirty work for these nasty characters, thus gaining a new way to save your family and yourself.

Craft new weapons


You have a small workshop in your cellar, where you can create new weapons. Ammunition is scarce and you'll have to find alternatives. There's also a small jail there that should provide you with ample opportunity to study the living dead…

Help the resistance


There is still a group of soldiers clinging to life and trying to fight off the zombies. By helping them, you can get on their good side and maybe, with your forces combined, you'll manage to clean up this city…

name: Zombie Hell: Infected City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Zombie Hell is an FPS where you take on the role of the head of a family – a father fighting for his family's survival, lest they all meet a grim end at the rotting hands of a zombie horde in an apocalyptic city.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
